mubtada.definition: The subject of a nominal sentence (جملة اسمية). It is the starting point of the sentence and is typically in the nominative case (مرفوع).
mubtada.example: In 'الطالِبُ مجتهدٌ', the word 'الطالِبُ' is the مبتدأ.

khabar.definition: The predicate of a nominal sentence (جملة اسمية). It provides information about the subject (مبتدأ) and is also typically in the nominative case (مرفوع).
khabar.example: In 'الطالِبُ مجتهدٌ', the word 'مجتهدٌ' is the خبر.

marfu.definition: The nominative case. Used for the subject and the predicate of a nominal sentence. Default signs: ضمّة (ـُ) or تنوين الضمّ (ـٌ).

mansub.definition: The accusative case. Used primarily for the direct object (مفعول به). Particles like 'إنَّ' put the following noun in this case. Default signs: فتحة (ـَ) or تنوين الفتح (ـً).

majrur.definition: The genitive case. Used for a noun after a preposition (مثل: فِي، لِـ، مِنْ) أو المضاف إليه في إضافة. العلامة: كسرة (ـِ) أو تنوين الكسر (ـٍ).
majrur.example: الاسم بعد حرف الجرّ (مثل: فِي) يكون مجرورًا.

maful_bihi.definition: The direct object of a verb. It is always in the accusative case (منصوب).

fiil.definition: A verb. In a verbal sentence (جملة فعلية), the verb typically comes first and assigns case to what follows.

faail.definition: The doer/subject of the verb in a verbal sentence. It is typically مرفوع.

huruf_al_jarr.definition: Prepositions that cause the following noun to be مجرور. Examples: فِي، لِـ، مِنْ.
huruf_al_jarr.example: In 'فِي الْبَيْتِ', 'فِي' حرف جرّ و'الْبَيْتِ' مجرور.

inna.definition: A particle that makes the following noun منصوب and the predicate مرفوع.
inna.example: In 'إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ', 'اللَّهَ' منصوب بسبب إنَّ.

jumla_ismiyyah.definition: A sentence that begins with a noun. The مبتدأ and خبر are typically مرفوع.

jumla_fiiliyya.definition: A sentence that begins with a verb. The فاعل is مرفوع and the مفعول به is منصوب.

marifah.definition: Definiteness. A definite noun, e.g., with 'ال', proper names, or by إضافة to a definite noun.

nakira.definition: Indefiniteness. An indefinite noun, often marked by تنوين and lacking 'ال'.

idafa.definition: A construct phrase linking two nouns; the second (المضاف إليه) is مجرور. If the second is definite, the whole phrase becomes definite.
idafa.example: 'بَيْتُ الطَّالِبِ' إضافة، والعبارة معرفة لأن 'الطَّالِبِ' معرفة.
